name: Perang Cemen III Destiny & Dice
description:
In a world where Dungeon and Dragon exits, one man fated to change everything forever...

The tale starts with you a hero whose reincarnated from the past or you are a heroic soul summoned from another world or whatever you are were forced to carry destiny of the world by the overseer whose watching over the fate and send you to a 200 years after the Black Dragon of Ruin slain by a certain Hero.

-The Beginning-

Before the game begins, you need to pick one of (male or female), this is important since it's affect gameplay at some point, the name you chose doesn't matter.

After telling your name the overseer will begin to ask you a few questions while rolling the dice that decide your stats, the answer you give will have an impact to your alignment and moral.

*Before you answer the question you can chose "I'm the Chosen One" instead of "Yes" for Pre-defined Class, read Taboo 00.txt or Taboo 01.txt or Taboo 02.txt or Taboo 03.txt for more info.

The game begins after you answer all the question given and then moved to another location, from there you are free to move.

There are wooden chest located in a west from your starting point, go there to get starting funds and supply, also... avoid encounters (yellow) and traps (red) while at it and focus to get out from their first since you can't save until you reach a safe location located in the north,

Well... the difficulty is kinda bugged so you might died from the get go and that will be annoying to start all over again.

*There are another chest made of metal that needs a password to unlock, read Taboo 00.txt or Taboo 01.txt or Taboo 02.txt or Taboo 03.txt for more info.

-Knowledge is Powah-

WARNING! Many stuff that's happening in this game is decided by rolling a dice, so if history is to change, let it change. If the world is to be destroyed, so be it. If your fate is to die, I must simply laugh, Gwahahahahaha!

Below are basic rule, but you don't need to read it unless you are lacking common sense in games, well... this game is nonsense so make sure to read it.

Food, most action may consume food, should your food goes below 0 you may take damage whenever you do an action, if you die from this effect, it's game over, also the damage is stacked so you be better eaten something than use items or magic to heal yourself.

Metal/Wood, it's a material scraped from items, it's can be used mostly to build something but can be used for other things too like make a fake money... swap object... et cetera.

Good/Evil, it's your moral value, you begin with 50 and changed based on your behavior such as evil deed or good deed.

Chaotic/Lawful, are your alignment value, it's changed based on your behavior mostly related to law.

Fame, it's peoples opinion about you unlike moral or alignment, fame is your standing point, the higher your fame the easier you make people trust you and bend them as you please.

Equipment such as Weapon and Armor has durability so make sure to fix them before big and long battle, mostly against bosses.

Combat system are turn based so take your time and think before you act.

The combat system is turn based so take your time and think before you act.

For the rest... you may learn it yourself which is the point of the game, if you had some question or something, feel free to leave the message below.
